subject: Doping (Sports)
Weight Lifting
lead_paragraph: Don Ramos, who holds several weight-lifting world records for his age group, has had a Forrest Gumpian odyssey, 80 years of life that were nullified by one drug test.
snippet: Don Ramos, who holds several weight-lifting world records for his age group, has had a Forrest Gumpian odyssey, 80 years of life that were nullified by one drug test.
